original_text: I am suffering very much. Why does God let me wake up each day? I am very upset, so why does God continue to let me live? I am suffering very much. Why does God let me wake up each day? I am very upset, so why does God continue to let me live? I am suffering very much.
korean_text: 어찌하여 고난 당하는 자에게 빛을 주셨으며 마음이 아픈 자에게 생명을 주셨는고

sentences.original_text: Why does God let me wake up each day?
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 어째서 매일 내가 깨어나게 하시는가?

sentences.original_text: so why does God continue to let me live?
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님은 왜 계속해서 내가 살게 하시는가?

sentences.original_text: Why does God let me wake up each day?
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 어째서 매일 내가 깨어나게 하시는가?

sentences.original_text: so why does God continue to let me live?
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님은 왜 계속해서 내가 살게 하시는가?
